product_name: Eagle Creek Gear Warrior Wheeled Duffel - 32"
long_description: The Eagle Creek Gear Warrior 32 wheeled duffel is rugged and durable, and provides versatility for any adventure. It's the perfect travel companion for extended excursions stateside or abroad. Large main compartment with compression straps and zip mesh organizer pocket. Large secondary pocket, accessed by its own exterior zipper, allows gear and clothing to be packed separately; includes a zip mesh organizer pocket. Laundry Chute(TM) pocket, with exterior access, keeps wet or dirty gear separate from the clean. Stowable Equipment Keeper(TM) exterior elastic lash strap lets you hold gear and clothing on the luggage via the Porter Key(TM) bottle opener attachment. Oversize super-tread wheels with protective housing guards roll easily over urban obstacles. Handle extends smoothly and offers a comfortable grip; cleanly zips away when not deployed. Piggyback clip attaches an additional bag, allowing both to be wheeled as 1. Multiple grab handles; center harness handle doubles as lash points. Built-in durability: rugged corner guards, reinforced hypalon material blocking, bumper protection and reinforced bartaks. Exterior wings with full front compression straps secure and stabilize your load. Lockable, self-repairing zippers have finger-friendly zipper pulls; luggage locks sold separately. ID tag slips neatly away. Contrast accents throughout Gear Warrior 32 allow easy identification on the luggage belt. Reflective accents for dusk and nighttime visibility. Integrates with Eagle Creek Pack-It(R) Systems, sold separately.
short_description: The Eagle Creek Gear Warrior 32 wheeled duffel is rugged and durable, and provides versatility for any adventure. It's the perfect travel companion for extended excursions stateside or abroad.
